titles.title: Code Grabber Prohibition Act of 1994
To amend title 18, United States Code, to protect against code grabbers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2050)
Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/4/1994--Introduced. Code Grabber Prohibition Act of 1994 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit the use of a coded signal sent by a motor vehicle alarm system unless the interception, access, disclosure, or other conduct otherwise prohibited is for a noncriminal and nontortious purpose.
